tuningParts.name: Engine Upgrade
tuningParts.description: Increases the vehicle's horsepower for better acceleration.

tuningParts.name: Suspension Upgrade
tuningParts.description: Improves the vehicle's suspension for better handling on rough terrain.

tuningParts.name: Tire Upgrade
tuningParts.description: Enhances tire grip for improved traction.

tuningParts.name: Fuel Tank Upgrade
tuningParts.description: Increases fuel capacity for longer races.

tuningParts.name: Weight Reduction
tuningParts.description: Reduces the vehicle's weight for better speed and acceleration.

tuningParts.name: Nitro Boost
tuningParts.description: Provides a temporary speed boost during races.
